name: Fluffshi's Visual Novel (Beta)
description:
Hello! I'm Fluffshi and I'm creating the most cursed s***post visual novel meme of all time! Please join me along the way as i learn how to code and make a game.

People working on the game as we speak are:

Me/Fluffshi - Coding, photoshop, Storywriting

Ghostlykeys - Artist

@Bionyx - Coding
